name: Frog Mania
description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹𝘀 :

 Arrow Keys : ←↓→ ↑ 

This game is about a curious frog who wants finds himself in a dark cave and has a goal or seeing the sky. This game was made casually over 12 days.

There is a  double jump that is on a timer meaning you can only jump when your first jump has finished.

𝗖𝗿𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁𝘀 :

Art :  HIS

Music : Florian Stracker

Code : Drk & v0le

Any Feedback Appreciated.
